name: The Last Bastion of Mana
description:
MFGJ SUMMER 2021 Game

Description

The Last Bastion Of Mana is a "Tower-Defense" style game where your goal is to survive as long as possible, keeping your city alive by building up your defense with walls and various towers. There is no "cost" for these towers and walls, as you can place as many as you want, but be wary - the more of each defense you have placed, the weaker they get!

Defenses

Wall - Strong Defense that Prevents The Swarm from Attacking Towers

Air Towers - Fires of a Blast of Air in all Directions, Dealing Damage to Enemies

Fire Towers - Fires A Flame in a Cone, Dealing Continuous Damage to Enemies

Fountains - Heals the Structures next to the Fountains

Tips

Don't just spam towers and walls - this is a good way to lose fast.

You can upgrade the strength of your defenses with the points you get from killing The Swarm.

Have fun!
